name: LcInstaller Repo
subtitle: LiveContainer Installer Repo to install or update LcInstaller

apps.name: LcInstaller
apps.subtitle: App installer for LiveContainer
apps.versionDescription:
- Fix issue with bottom navigation bar hiding apps
- Optimize app loading logic to load app lists faster for repos with 1000+ apps
- Removed database for apps and screenshots to store them in memory for better performance
apps.localizedDescription: Install apps on LiveContainer from different sources with ease!
